title: Statement from the 18th meeting of the Bank Board of Národná banka Slovenska (National Bank ...
text: ( Source : National Bank of Slovakia ) 20. 10. 2015 | Press Release of the NBS The Bank Board of Národná banka Slovenska today ( 20 October ) held its 18th meeting of 2015, chaired by Jozef Makúch, the NBS Governor . The Bank Board approved a
